:::

Highlighting ($H$) and editing ($E$) average statistics across directions and highlight modalities. **Measured**: actual edits performed in the specified modality. **Projected**: using modality highlights over [No Highlight]{.smallcaps color='brand-color.nohighlight'} edits to account for editing biases (@sec-qe4pe-highlights-edits). Random highlights matching average word frequencies are used as [random]{color='brand-color.random'} baseline, and Projected [increases$_\uparrow$]{color="#228b22"}/[decreases$_\downarrow$]{color="#dc143c"} compared to Measured counterparts are shown. Significant [Oracle]{.smallcaps color='brand-color.oracle'} gains over all other modalities are [underlined]{.underline} ($p<0.05$ with Bonferroni correction).
:::
